sub_title: Financial inclusion and Digitalization Advisor | Impact Investing | Supervisory Board Member
summary:
•	Twenty years of multi-cultural involvement in the banking and microfinance industry, that included work in Africa, Eastern Europe, Asia and Central America

•	Supervisory Board Member and Advisor for microfinance and social impact investors.

•	Operations, IT and executive management of microfinance banks, in positions of Technology Director, Chief Operating Officer and Deputy Chief Executive Officer

•	Microfinance banks and programs design in emerging countries, implementation of green field microbanks and due diligence for acquisitions and mergers of microfinance institutions

•	Development and implementation of operational policies and procedures, operational processes design and implementation, operations internal controls (including cash handling, payments, reconciliations of account and e-banking)

•	Assessment, management, monitoring and mitigation of operational risk

•	Digital strategies. Implementation of banking core systems, including the process engineering to ensure efficiency of banking and microfinance operations; I leverage my knowledge in using technology to increase outreach and provide financial services to rural/remote areas

•	Rural/Agri finance program design, including cashless payment systems for small holder farmers contracted by agriculture corporations

treasury_media.title: Advision Finance B.V.
treasury_media.description: AdVision Finance provides strategy and management advisory services to financial institutions driven by sustainability, social and environmental impact. We provoke out of the box thinking and innovative business and operating models by leveraging on customer centric technology solutions.

education.field_of_study: Master Black Belt Six Sigma - Financial Services

school.name: Academia de Studii Economice din București

profile_positions.description:
Operations and IT: Process design, controls setup, organizational setup, training modules and operational and management reporting. Linkages to IT support systems and delivery channels needed to achieve the full set of controls and efficiencies required to remain competitive from an operational perspective. Business processes set up for core banking systems implementations.
Regional, global standardization of operations and IT for muti-branch or international organizations.
 
Risk Management: Operational and IT risk assessment, monitoring and management tools, controls tips and operational fraud prevention advice. Risk policies, processes and risk self-assessment support tools.
 
Strategy, Business Plans: Support in writing comprehensive business plans and defining market penetration strategy.  Workshops to facilitate board and senior management of the financial institution in order to achieve a transparent, comprehensive and concise way forward for the organization. Output and reports can used at Board, Executive Management as well as third party level to acquire access to capital market or credit lines.
 
Distribution models: Planning and implementation of a Distribution strategy through the use of highly efficient distribution models, customized to the institutions needs and long term goals. Business case, IT and operational implementation planning as well as project management is offered.

Rural finance models: Implementation models to achieve profitable outreach in rural areas. Business cases, implementation plans and project management services to both financial institutions and agriculture corporations that are or want to set up a partnerships with financial institutions.
 
Feasibility studies and financial institutions start ups in the emerging markets: Business plans, Project management and planning for starting up new financial institutions in emerging countries.
profile_positions.title: Director, Banking and Microfinance Advisor
Digital Transformation Advisor to the Board of Directors

profile_positions.description:
•	Designing the bank's medium and long term strategy. Member of the executive team that managed the process of attracting critical new investment in the bank.

•	Responsible for the entire bank’s operations, including branch network, back office operations (payments, trade finance, reconciliations, e-banking management), bank’s procurement and administration, operational risk, processes and internal controls, as well as management of bank’s change projects’ portfolio.

•	Redesign of operations front and back office processes, bringing efficiency and improving controls; i.e. reduced the time for opening an account from 45 minutes to 10 minutes by reducing forms and automating the account opening process; introducing the non-personalized ATM card (instant issuing).

•	Redesigning the IT systems architecture and re-implementing the core banking system (T24); trained and mentored operations and IT staff with regards to the efficient use of the new processes and the core banking system.

•	Strengthen the internal controls, by setting up control diaries and check list items in the branches and head office operations, forming and implementing accounts reconciliations procedures and department; trained and mentored front and back office staff in effective internal controls.

•	Design, implementation and management of cashless payment system for tobacco small holder farmers, by setting up a Bank on wheels (bank truck), remote ATM network and field account opening process.
profile_positions.title: Chief Operating Officer and Deputy Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed the bank’s back office operations, IT infrastructure, procurement and administration, as well as the credit risk and bank’s projects portfolio management.

•	Implemented the risk management and monitoring methodology in operations, IT, credit, and agrifinance areas of the bank.

•	Set up and implemented the agriculture lending operations (policies, procedures, processes and CRM systems for agriculture related products and services within the bank), as well as payment system for tobacco smallholder farmers.

•	Redesigned and implemented efficient IT architecture and organizational structure to allow future aggressive growth.

•	Set up of new branches and deployment of mobile branches (trucks) in the rural areas
profile_positions.title: Chief Operating Officer, Banco Oportunidade

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed the microfinance operations, processes, IT systems, operational and credit risk, internal compliance.

•	Restructuring of the microfinance institution, closure of branches, reorganization of the existing business model, implementation of controls and redesign of the business processes.

•	Managing the recovery process during the crisis created by the post-election violence; more than 80% of the customers were affected; Over 75% of portfolio was recovered in the most affected area of the country, by end of 2008.

•	Integration process of all operations with a new acquisition – merging of two microfinance institutions from two different regions of Kenya – resulted in one organization with 13 branches in Kenya

•	Re-branding of the organization: process re-engineering, change of delivery model, set and implement credit policies and procedures, image and brand change

•	Set up a fully operational Risk and Internal compliance function in Opportunity Kenya
profile_positions.title: Chief Operating Officer, Opportunity Kenya

profile_positions.description:
•	Start up of Opportunity Banks in Africa - business processes design, standardization of banking software implementation and IT infrastructure set up

•	Managing the systems transition from NGOs to commercial banks

•	Standardization of the IT infrastructure (including telecoms) of all Opportunity banks in Africa, manage the IT staff in the region (IT country Directors reported to the Regional Office), implement IT audit systems, standard IT policies and procedures for Opportunity banks in Africa (10 banks)

•	IT strategic planning and budget for the regional office and the OI banks in Africa

•	Coordinating the regional communication between the IT services/support center and the OI banks in Africa, developing and maintaining an online forum and helpdesk platform for Africa Region

•	IT capacity building in OI banks in Africa, Regional IT trainings, creating a regional knowledge transfer platform via regular conferences, online knowledge base, exchange of experience on the job

•	Different IT and operational advisory roles for the Opportunity banks in Africa, in Kenya, Tanzania, Rwanda, Ghana, Uganda, Malawi, Mozambique, South Africa
profile_positions.title: Regional Technology Director for Africa

profile_positions.description:
The bank started up by acquiring three different microfinance programs in three different provinces. The start up team was made of five executive managers (myself included). The bank opened in 2005, head office in Maputo and four branches in four different provinces.

•	Member of the executive start up team: operations processes and systems implementation

•	Design branch operations processes (credit, savings and cash operations) in accordance with the Central bank legal requirements

•	Implement technology systems (banking software, biometrics and mobile bank) to ensure cost effectiveness and efficiency of all processes

•	Train all branch and head office staff in the processes, policies and workflows

•	Design and set up the infrastructure and delivery channels of the head office and four branches in the country
profile_positions.title: Project Manager/Banking Consultant, Banco Oportunidade (start-up)

profile_positions.description:
•	Opportunity Bank in Serbia – core banking software (T24) implementation and processes/workflows design for converting the existing NGO into a microfinance bank, training of credit, finance and operations staff

•	Opportunity Romania – process re-engineering and core banking software (T24) implementation, training of all front and back office staff

•	Opportunity Albania – process re-engineering and core banking software implementation (T24), training of credit, finance and operations staff

•	Opportunity Bank Phillippines – Project Manager and Business consultant for the core banking systems implementation and process redesign
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst/Project Manager
Business Analyst, Opportunity International Bank of Malawi (OIBM)
